title: mEnmEl shOdippadEn
sahitya:
mEnmEl shOdippadEn ennai nI murugA


anupallavi

  unmEl aLavillAmal ennuLLamadil bhakti Urip-peruga nAn kOrum aruL tarAdu


caraNam    aravaNaitt-anbODu aDiyEnai Adarittu aruL purindiDAmal varundiDavE viTTu
karuNaiyuDanE un kazhalaDi tozhuvOrai kaDait-tETri viDum vaDa pazhani vAsanE
